alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:04PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Columbia, northeastern Richmond, south central Edgefield and west central Aiken Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 403 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Augusta National Golf Club, or near North Augusta, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Aiken Mall, Augusta, Clearwater, Belvedere, USC Aiken, Citizens Park, Gloverville, Augusta National Golf Club, Graniteville, Burnettown, West End Augusta, Poverty Hill, Kroc Center, Savannah Bluffs Heritage Preserve, Savannah Rapids Park, Medical District Augusta, Harrisburg, and Vaucluse. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 200 and 201. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 0 and 15. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 12 and 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
